title: Body Dysmorphic Disorder
description: A comprehensive guide to Body Dysmorphic Disorder, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Body Dysmorphic Disorder is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Obsessive-Compulsive and Related Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
